result.markdown: --- title: "Week 4: Simple forecasting methods" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Four benchmark forecasting methods that we will use for comparison * Forecasting with transformations * Forecasting with decompositions ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html), Sections 5.1, 5.2, 5.6, and 5.7, and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-5, 11 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Friday 28 March. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 4 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868369) is due on Sunday 30 March.
